amendment.description: To authorize the Secretary to remove oil bollards in Burlington Harbor, VT.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1675 as modified agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 1675 proposed by Senator Reid for Senator Leahy. (consideration: CR S11539-11544) To authorize the Secretary to remove oil bollards in Burlington Harbor, VT.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1675 as modified agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1675 proposed by Senator Reid for Senator Leahy.
